name: vin_decoder_basic
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool vin_decoder.
Tool description: This VIN decoder covers up to 168 fields for the USA and Canada. It also includes VIN lookup by US license plate and state. The database is updated regularly. 
[View documents](https://rapidapi.com/dominonet-lTpEE6zONeS/api/vin-decoder19/details)
API description: Decodes basic information from a Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) using the RapidAPI VIN decoder service.

vin.description: The Vehicle Identification Number (VIN) to be decoded. Must be 17 characters long.
